Developer Terms of Use
des: All super smash bros. characters are included including all DLC characters for super smash bros. ultimate. For Bowser Jr. there is no option such as Lemmy or Morton which is just a different skin for Bowser Jr.

Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
